cards.title: Emmett's Cafe
cards.description: Few things are more common and familiar than a cup of coffee and a bite to eat. Whether it's a quick breakfast after the gym, a working lunch, or a nourishing dinner with friends and family, food is central to everyday life.

cards.title: Nada
cards.description: The lunchbox comes with an order of tacos, your choice of side, and a donut. If you're looking for a little bit more substantial meal they also have some large plates like fried chicken or steak.

cards.title: The Brown Bag Deli
cards.description: The Brown Bag Deli is always sure to be serving sensational seasonal dishes and all of your favorite deli classics.

cards.title: Katalina's
cards.description: Katalina's is the essence of a trendy brunch. They have both sweet and savory dishes but their pancake balls are what they're really known for.

cards.title: Brassica
cards.description: Brassica cares about the health of the environment and the people who eat there. Therefore, everything you'll eat a Brassica's is fresh and good for you.
